name: Co-founder Agreement
content: This Co-founder Agreement template helps establish clear roles, responsibilities, and equity distribution among company founders. It covers decision-making processes, intellectual property ownership, and exit procedures.

name: Non-disclosure agreement (NDA)
content: A Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) template to protect confidential information shared between parties. This template includes standard clauses for mutual protection and defines what constitutes confidential information.

name: Mutual Non-disclosure Agreement
content: This Mutual NDA template provides protection for both parties when sharing confidential information. It establishes clear guidelines for information handling and return obligations.

name: Employment Contract
content: A comprehensive Employment Contract template covering job responsibilities, compensation, benefits, termination clauses, and intellectual property assignments for startup employees.

name: Advisor Agreement
content: This Advisor Agreement template outlines the relationship between a startup and its advisors, including equity compensation, time commitments, and confidentiality obligations.

name: Letter of Intent (LOI)
content: A Letter of Intent template for expressing preliminary interest in business transactions, partnerships, or investments. Includes key terms and conditions for further negotiations.

name: Memorandum of Understanding (MOU)
content: This MOU template establishes the framework for cooperation between parties, outlining mutual understanding and preliminary agreements before formal contracts.

name: Term Sheets
content: A Term Sheet template for investment rounds, covering valuation, investment amount, liquidation preferences, board composition, and other key investment terms.

name: Stock Option Agreement
content: This Stock Option Agreement template provides a framework for granting equity compensation to employees, including vesting schedules and exercise provisions.

name: Shareholder Agreement
content: A Shareholder Agreement template governing the relationship between company shareholders, including voting rights, transfer restrictions, and dispute resolution mechanisms.

name: Tenancy Agreement
content: A comprehensive Tenancy Agreement template covering rental terms, tenant and landlord obligations, deposit requirements, and property maintenance responsibilities.

name: Sales & Purchase Agreement
content: This Sales & Purchase Agreement template provides a framework for real estate transactions, including property details, purchase price, closing conditions, and contingencies.

name: Lease Termination
content: A Lease Termination template outlining the procedures and requirements for ending a rental agreement, including notice periods and property condition requirements.

name: Rent Increase Letter
content: This Rent Increase Letter template provides a formal way to notify tenants of rental increases, including legal requirements and effective dates.
